Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-1KM (Leu-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXA; UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: Dark-spotted frogs, Pelophylax nigromaculatus, Kunming, Yunnan, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Host expression: Region depedent expression profiles of the AMP were noticed.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 12.5 ug/ml), S. aureus (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), and C. albicans (MIC 12.5 ug/ml).Antimicrobial robustness: Antimicrobial activity is serum-sensitive (6-12.5 uM after incubation with 50% serum for 12 h) and lost after incubation for 24 h in 50% serum.  Name updated 3/2018; 7/2021; 10/2023.
Literature Information.Author: Song Y, Ji S, Liu W, Yu X, Meng Q, Lai R.2013
Literature Information.Title: Different Expression Profiles of Bioactive Peptides in Pelophylax nigromaculatus from Distinct Regions.
